Metadata.title: Breno Ocanha | Front-end Engineer
Metadata.description: Passionate Front-end Developer dedicated to transforming ideas into stunning visual experiences with Next.js. I navigate the coding realm with precision, balancing form and function. Explore my portfolio to discover how I breathe life into innovation, elevating aesthetics and usability to new heights. Welcome to the one-year journey of digital creation and excellence.
